segments.text: What in the world is that smell ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The aroma of roasting coffee beans .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Smells like you're baking something . What are those ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Green beans . They pop and turn brown when you roast them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cool ! But isn't that a hot air popcorn popper ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This machine roasts the beans just right . If you roast them too long , or the temperature is too hot ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The beans will burn . I know . I've tasted burnt coffee before ... yuck !
segments.speaker: S1
